alert.note: Alert for Central and Eastern Montgomery County; Central and Southern Scott County; Conway; Garland; Johnson County Higher Elevations; Northern Montgomery County Higher Elevations; Northern Polk County Higher Elevations; Northern Scott County; Northwest Yell County; Perry; Pike; Polk County Lower Elevations; Pope County Higher Elevations; Southeast Polk County Higher Elevations; Southern Johnson County; Southern Pope County; Southern and Eastern Logan County; Southwest Montgomery County Higher Elevations; Western and Northern Logan County; Yell Excluding Northwest (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 19 at 11:28AM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...EXPECT ELEVATED WILDFIRE DANGER TODAY... VERY DRY AIR WILL REMAIN IN PLACE THROUGH THIS AFTERNOON. MINIMUM RELATIVE HUMIDITY LEVELS WILL DROP NEAR OR BELOW THE 30 PERCENT RANGE FOR MOST AREAS. THIS WILL CREATE AN ELEVATED WILDFIRE DANGER FOR PARTS OF WESTERN ARKANSAS. WINDS WILL REMAIN AROUND 8 TO 12 MPH... KEEPING CONDITIONS BELOW RED FLAG LEVELS. HUMIDITY LEVELS WILL START INCREASING TONIGHT BUT COULD DROP BACK BELOW 40 PERCENT FOR THE DAY ON WEDNESDAY. BREEZY SOUTHERLY WINDS WILL RETURN FOR WEDNESDAY AS WELL. IF A WILDFIRE IS OBSERVED...REPORT IT BY DIALING 9 1 1...OR CALL THE ARKANSAS FORESTRY COMMISSION AT 8 0 0...4 6 8...8 8 3 4.
